Description: Fragment of rim and handle-plate of North Ionian(?) pottery column-krater; fine beige clay with some mica; wholly glazed save top of neck and top of rim; silhouette goose with head reverted on handle-plate; rays or lotus flower on rim.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1219)
